---
id: QuerySingleOrder
title: Query Single Order
sidebar_label: Query Single Order
sidebar_position: 1
description: /spot/v4/order
---

**Type:** GET

**Description:** `/spot/v4/order`

### Limit Flow Rules

10/s/apikey

### Parameters

| Name            | Type   | Mandatory | Default | Description     |
| --------------- | ------ | --------- | ------- | --------------- |
| `orderId`       | number | No        |         | Order ID        |
| `clientOrderId` | string | No        |         | Client order ID |

### Response Example

```json title="Response"
{
  "rc": 0,
  "mc": "string",
  "ma": [{}],
  "result": {
    "symbol": "BTC_USDT",
    "orderId": "6216559590087220004",
    "clientOrderId": "16559590087220001",
    "baseCurrency": "string",
    "quoteCurrency": "string",
    "side": "BUY",             // order side: BUY, SELL
    "type": "LIMIT",           // order type: LIMIT, MARKET
```
